channel.title: Spec bar!
channel.description: hey i need help fixing the spec bar. i have a spec bar and the specs work but i have a small panel at the top of the window that says when it is on or off but i want the spec bar to light up. how do i do this?

hey i need help fixing the spec bar. i have a spec bar and the specs work but i have a small panel at the top of the window that says when it is on or off but i want the spec bar to light up. how do i do this?
